Posts.Content: MS225 wrote: My mom got diagnosed with ER+/PR+ HER 2- Grade 4, Metasized to bones breast cancer. Doc wants to start with Chemo and told us that hormone therapy is an option as well. Is hormone therapy equally potent. Can she just get hormone therapy and not chemo? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My Mom just got diagnosed MS225 MS225

Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2018 11:48PM MS225 wrote: Thanks for your response. My mom started hormone therapy today after much thinking and discussion with the doctor. She isn’t ready for chemo which according to the doc will act faster than hormone therapy.
